content: wrap yourself in the warmth of this wonderful crochet hoodie wrap that s perfect for unpredictable autumn weather stitched in unique bernat lattice neon this pattern is a celebration of simple stitchwork learn chain half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch seaming and more choose from 2 radiant colorways to bring your version to life with no sizing to fuss over it s a great gift for the trendy fashionista on your list materials bernat® lattice™ 7 8 oz/220 g 389 yds/356 m blacklight 19034 5 balls or 1810 yds/1654 m measurements approx 72 x 20 183 cm x 51 cm not including hood
